TikTok is a data collection service that is thinly-veiled as a social network. - Phone hardware (cpu type, number of course, hardware ids, screen dimensions, dpi, memory usage, disk space, etc) - Other apps you have installed (I've even seen some I've deleted show up in their analytics payload - maybe using as cached value?) - Everything network-related (ip, local ip, router mac, your mac, wifi access point name) - Whether or not you're rooted/jailbroken And many other things

Suggestion (something I bumped into several times and is definitely a use case): When you open a pic in someone's profile, then start scrolling down to browse the rest, and finally you step back, the app should remember the location (the exact picture) where you stepped back from. Since the beginning of introduction of locking the profile feature and the profile picture guard, these features were NEVER available in my profile (these were present in those of my friends and family, living in my area and those very far away too). Please provide the Safety feature as soon as possible.

Apparently after an update, I've lost the "adding stickers to the post" function, so I really want it back. In addition, please allow users to switch between the pages they run and their personal accounts. Having to use a browser just to do that is an absolute nuisance. For the latest update, please return the usual notification settings. What I need are specific notifications, not the one repetitively saying "You have a new notification".

There seem to be so many bugs lately and it's getting super annoying. Most recently I couldn't see my top notification unless I closed the app and reopened it. That appears to be fixed now, but last night and today my phone has been going crazy with the notification sound and a message that just says, "You have a new notification" which I never do, but that doesn't stop it from dinging and showing up. Please fix it.

I've noticed that the app keeps saying "connection failed, try again" every other time I try to log in and my connection is fine. I also notice that it doesn't scroll to the very top of my notification so I can't see my most recent notifications (a few other people on my timeline have complained about this issue with the notifications as well). I have to keep clearing cache for the app to properly work and I shouldn't have to do that. Also my notification count is wrong. Please fix.

After the most recent update the app has been so glitchy! My main problem has been with the notification tab, it cuts off the most recent notification to where you can't see or click on it. It forces you to close out of the app completely and go back in every single time I need to check my notifs. I've also had the problem of it not letting me click to view pictures, it just freezes and I have to back space out of it.

Until the last update app worked fine. I wish there was a "mark all read" on the notifications like there is on desktop, since I don't have a computer right now. But that is neither here nor there. What is here is my notifications not loading properly so I have to close and reopen the app. I can see the bottom edge of the notification but can't scroll up to see it. This is a new and irritating problem.

1st off, I have 5G and high speed wireless and it doesn't seem to make a difference when it comes to loading my posts, pics, comments, etc. They are taking FOREVER to load, sometimes several minutes! My notification tab will randomly decide not to load correctly (can't see the top few, they are cut off) Closing out of the app and restarting it seems to work for a few minutes. You expect an app to run smoother with time but it just continues to get worse

Facebook used to be a good app but now, I can not post things without any explanation several times in one day. I can not even like other posts, one minute I can and the next minute I can not. I will reconsider my rating whenever this app is working properly! Right now, it is junky. If there is a rating of -1, that is a sufficient rating!

I don't know what went wrong with the newest update, but for some reason the group chats are just unusable. Certain people won't be able to send messages in a specific group chat for 5-20 minutes, and then all their unsent messages will send all at once. But they can still message other group chats and individuals. It's really frustrating and annoying. I like Snapchat, but my friends are moving our group chat to a different platform for now.

The app is quite good but whenever there is an update it ALWAYS shows "bug fixes and improvement" but there is no such improvement or new things added in the app. The developer should provide the exact information. And just because of this I am rating u 4 instead of 5. Anyways keep going and Plz seek to our problems too.

Love this app but really not a fan of swiping to snap maps instead of swiping into a conversation, swiping into the conversation was a great feature and now every time I try to chat to someone I have to wait for maps to load so I can go back to the chat without it lagging. On top of that the app seems to get slower with each update

The new update is very irritating as it does not allow you to swipe onto the snapchat messages , as swiping now takes you onto snapmaps. However, you can swipe onto messages sometimes by chance, so it doesn't really make much sense. Also, the fact that there is a permanent button bar at the bottom of the screen means that a large amount of the screen is now less visible. Its not a good update and doesn't help anything. Sort it out snapchat.

Overall a great app, perfect for talking to friends, lots of things to do. However, the new look is really not it. The old version was perfectly fine, was much less clunky, and honestly looked a lot better. Other than how it looks now, it works well and is fast.

New update completely ruined the app for me, the swipe to chat feature is basically gone, the only way to actually swipe is to go to the far left on the chat bar at the bitmoji and swipe, and sometimes that doesn't even work and just opens the map. Also, the new "action bar" sits on top of my Samsung's navigation bar and takes up about an inch on my phone screen and honestly just looks ugly. There needs to be a way to go back to the old style, this new style is very annoying and painful to use.

Not sure how you guys are researching or anything with UI/UX, with same update where users were having trouble using it. When slide from chat to right why does it takes to map. Nobody wants to see the map and search it. Just put the chat version as it was ealier and WE WANT DARK THEME TO BE ENABLE, I CAN'T CHAT WITH FRIENDS WITH THIS BRIGHT LIGHT FLASHING IN MY EYES.

So this would be a five star review if I didn't have to reinstall it everytime I try to send a video. I love the app but if you try to send a video on android it starts crashing over and over until you reinstall it. Besides that, its basically perfect. But since I've had to install it 12 times in half as many days, its only getting one star for me.

The new update looks horrible, I want it to go back to how it was. It harder to navigate and looks displeasing on my screen. I also don't always get notifications when my friends snap me and then I tend to lose the streaks I have with those people. Please bring back the old update and fix these problems

I do not like how things are set up in this new update. Everything is more complicated for no reason. This new display is worst idea you've had. Before that huge mistake, you could just slide a friend's name to chat with them. Now it leads to the map. We really do not use the map that often. Especially in quarantine. Everybody is at home. Seriously what were you trying to achieve with this update. Fix this as soon as possible. Thank you.

I hate the new update. If I get a snap and a chat, I can't look at the chat until I open the snap. The old version I could just swipe over and get to the chat. Now it takes me to the map. I rarely need to get to the map. It is not necessary for the map to be so easily accessible. The old format was much simpler and easier to navigate. There was no reason to change the format, there was nothing wrong with the old one. I use snapchat all the time, but this update is terrible.

Well after I updated Snap everything was just fine until yesterday. It won't send my messages to my friends if I'm trying to chat with them. And it keeps saying internet lost/failed I don't really know. All I know is that it worked before and now I can't send anything besides streaks and my internet has been perfectly fine. I don't know but this is just wack.

App is great but, it doesnt help in using our phone's camera potential to fullest cos it relies only on main lens for every type of photo whereas nowadays, we have telephoto, ultrawide and macro. Heck, it doesnt even use night mode properly. Rest is good.(filters, games, UI, etc)

This app is fun to talk with friends, but there's a lot of things that can improve. It would be nice if I could customize the filter bar to easily access filters that I like. I would also like to be able to go back and open snaps again even after 6 seconds. The new update doesn't send me notifications anymore. Please make this app better!

okay sooo the new up date is completely trash!!! like I liked it before here you just had to swipe down on the camera for the map and left for the chats and right for the stories, but now you have to do excessive swiping to get to the maps or anything to be honest ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I hate it so so much go back to the old one before this one or update some features but keep it the same as before none the less. it's sad when I have friends asking me about the new update and saying they hate it as well. :(
THIS APP IS TERRIBLE. I HAVE SENT SO MANY BUG REPORTS AND FEEBACK REPORTS, AND NO ONE IS DOONG ANYTHING ABOUT IT. Ibhave had to reinstall this app about 20 times

This is so bad always has a update thay seem to do nothing my messages will just stop sending and all i will get is updating messages or sending for hours. Only stops when i restart my phone. Edit. The new update is horrible I would give it lower than at 1 star!!! Why did they put the black bar it looks horrible, not only does it look horrible it also got harder to use because no you swipe on a chat and it changes to the map. Like what is this!! The new navigation bar on the bottom is completely UNNECESSARY. It was just fine before. I don't use the map or the discover bs enough to need a button to access it. Like why?? REMOVE THE NAVIGATION BAR! I don't even have one on my phone. Why the heck do I need on in an app that neverrrrrrrrrr had one to begin with. Until it's removed gunna download a previous version.

App is pretty good at messaging and taking pictures. on Android they don't use the actual camera, rather its preview so the capturing and quality of images can be mediocre, but my biggest complaint is the interface. It's not hard to use but it's annoyingly bright. I wish they would add a dark mode so bad because using this app at night sucks.

New update was super unnecessary. User interface is WAY to clunky and crowded. Swiping right no longer takes you into the chat instead it takes you into their stupid maps that they've been trying to shove down our throats for a while now. I have a whole new navigation bar ontop of the one I already have. Bottom part of screen is now gone during snaps. Yeah. No good. Please revert or fix.

Snapchat at it's core is a pretty great platform. However, the development team has a severe case of redesign fever. This is the second time in the past maybe 3 years you've redesigned the app and made it worse. For years it's been ingrained as a habit in me and likely millions of others that you swipe to open a chat. And now it opens the Snapmap? A feature that I would wager 90% of the user base doesn't use. What is the thought process here? People are used to the setup and it worked well. My thinking is that Snapchat just isn't profitable enough, so they're perhaps changing their UI to make it more likely that people explore the profitable content. If you have a Snapchat account and friends already on the platform, then you're going to download it anyway. If you don't however, I'd reccomend you stay away. Platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter have a concise and simple design, but the Snapchat development team appear to have no idea what they want to do and every time they push a major update it worsens the user experience.

It's a good app but when you try to post a video from your gallery onto your story it won't upload and crashes the app. Only way to fix the crashing is to uninstall and reinstall. Please fix this. It's getting kind of annoying. Also the new update is awful, The layout is terrible. I hate using the app now

I've had a countless amount of issues with Snapchat over the past week. From not being able to see a person's messages, to not being able to talk in certain group chats whatsoever, not to mention messages being rearranged randomly. It's pretty disappointing considering Snapchat is such a large application used by many... you'd assume they'd be fixed, yet many updates have passed without a fix :(

The app WAS great... but since a few updates ago it has been glitchy and just bad. Sometimes it wont let me take photos at all, other times it wont send messages or will show a message as opened when the other person has answered the text as well, no matter how many times I reopen the app from scratch it wont work. I just had to delete and redownload the app in the Hope's that it would be fixed when It redownloaded and its STILL not working.

Snapchat audio does not use the media channel so therefore when a video is playing and you click a Snap video they both play at the same time. And half the time you can't get to replay it. This new update (with the 'black action bar") is actual dog shite. A quarter of my screen is now wasted space, and when you take a snap it still blacks it out. It looks and feels incredibly clunky, especially compared with the previously smooth design. Being able to swipe onto chats without opening snaps to read a past conversation is now impossible, and "half-swiping" is also impossible, which was an unintended feature that many people actually liked.

This app is getting on my freaking nerves not trying not be mean,but it was working for wonderfully for just a few days and now every single time i enter this app to talk to my friend i go to church with it freezes and then goes back to my home screen i can't even talk,nothing,nada. You know what the minute i get my friends phone number i am deleteing this app. I AM DONE I do not sugar coat things

The camera is Super choppy on my SONIM XP8. I have adjusted the "shutter speed" on my XP8 im not sure if that affected it at all, the same issue was dominating the entire experience. 1/5 stars cause its was the same on XP7 3+y/o

Recently the app has gone entirely downhill. The layout changes are awful, but it seems like everything is functioning worse. Videos glitch constantly and can't be opened. Texts can take up to 10 minutes to send, and no it's not my internet. The Android version is in DIRE need of an update.

A great app, but the new UI is terrible and unintuitive. It takes up way too much screen space, and makes it awkward to try to go where you want to go. Not to mention it clashes with the android design horribly. I wish there was a way to downgrade, and this update is why I am turning off auto updates.

Overall, it's a good app. Past updates have been a little rough, and the newest update is taking some getting used to, but I stl enjoy the app, and it's still fairly easy to use. My one suggestion is a dark theme. Every other social media I use has it, and it just feels weird that Snapchat doesn't. Thank you in advance, lol.

Seriously, quit the constant design changes. The app was fine. Everything was good. Everyone liked it. Now the interface reminds me of an app aimed at five year olds. Here's a suggestion, actually add features people want!! A dark mode, the ability to pin conversations just like in the iOS version and the ability to search Memories. You've ruined what is otherwise an amazing app.

It worked fine for years and then just went nuclear. There are a bunch of things that needs to be fixed for one change the new update back to the old one it really sucks and its just annoying 2. have a dark mode it would be cool 3. put a button to were we can send our streaks without having to press 40+ people 4. send notifications for when we are about to lose are streak 5. let us make our own bsf list 6. let us know when someone unadds us but make it to where u ca turn this update on or off if u want too. there's more but thats all for now

Needs Many Updates. I think they are more focused on updating the filters than the actual app. 1. Would be awesome if there was a "select all" feature when sending out daily snaps to all your snap friends. 2. When someone unfriends you, they get the grey arrow, or when someone blocks you, you get the red "!". Would be nice if they were automatically removed from your list too, so you're not wasting your time sending things to them all and having to weed through to remove them after...

It will say delievered but a few seconds later, it says Opened and will show a Snap my friend send even though I got no notification. 3) I will use a filter with music, sometimes though, when I play the video back, the music doesnt play back.

the new update is horiable. the old snapchat that they had before this update is a ot better then the new one. the slide down part to get to the snap map is better then going past the chats to go to it. the way that they put the shows on there own thing is bad the other way is better and to be nice i don't think that anyone accualy uses it. A redesign using a cross platform programming language, so we can get the same features on both iOS and Android.
